channel.title: DLing cache problems
channel.description:
Hey I recently got a new source and client. The client downloads the cache the first time you run it. This works fine on my computer, but when I try it on my laptop it gets stuck. Any one know why? Also is there any way I could put the cache with the client to begin with instead of dling it? Thanks.
edit: Facepalm, realized wrong section lol :\

item.title: DLing cache problems
item.dc:creator: @Woopzpkedu Woopzpkedu
item.description:
@Woopzpkedu wrote:

this is for PI
ok so put ur cache in ur client so yourclient/class/and put ur cache there
go to signlink.java
and look for something like this

public static String findcachedir() { String as[] = { "c:/.ss_474/" }; if(storeid < 32 || storeid > 34) storeid = 32; String s = ""; for(int i = 0; i < as.length; i++) try { and change it to

public static String findcachedir() { String as[] = { "./.ss_474/" }; if(storeid < 32 || storeid > 34) storeid = 32; String s = ""; for(int i = 0; i < as.length; i++) try {
